description.value:
Trigger Your turn ends

Requirements You are currently affected by a mental effect

Those who seek to bargain with or control you quickly learn that a trickster has slippery schemes and cunning ruses to elude the most carefully crafted wording or mental command. Until the end of your next turn, you ignore a single mental effect. You can suppress a particular effect using Trickster's Guile only once. You can't use Trickster's Guile to suppress an effect if you chose to have it affect you.

Special Your divinity allows you to use Trickster's Guile even if the mental effect is preventing you from using reactions (such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix] condition) or controlling you to use your reactions in a certain way.
